articles.title: Gigantic spider found in Australia, dubbed "Hercules," is a record-setter - CBS News
articles.description: The 3.1 inch Sydney funnel-web spider is expected to be a big contributor to a reptile park's antivenom program.
articles.content: Sydney — With fangs that could pierce a human fingernail, the largest male specimen of the world's most poisonous arachnid has found a new home at the Australian Reptile Park where it will help save … [+2362 chars]
